images.copyright: Key monastery at Spiti valley, Himachal Pradesh (© Inigo Cia/Getty Images)
images.title: The Key Monastery in Spiti, Himachal
images.caption: The Key Monastery in Spiti, Himachal
images.desc: Located at an altitude of 4166 metres above sea level, the Key Gompa Tibetan monastery rests on a hilltop near the Spiti river. The colourful history of the region has seen Key under attack by the Moghuls, the Dogras, and other armies. A fire in 1840 and an earthquake in 1975 also caused damage to this monastery, which was restored by the Archeological Survey of India.

tooltips.walle: ही प्रतिमा वॉलपेपर म्हणून डाउनलोड करण्यास उपलब्ध नाही.
tooltips.walls: ही प्रतिमा डाउनलोड करा. या प्रतिमेचा वापर केवळ वॉलपेपरसाठी निर्बंधित आहे.
